cottontail now you are going to start working in the pattern knit to end of round round again round 2 k 2 4 6 work next row of set up round this will be your bor place a cottontail pattern knit to end of round marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap break repeat round 2 until you have completed all contrast yarn and start working with main 12 row of the cottontail pattern colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pm k 2 continue working as established completing 4 6 work row 1 of cottontail pattern k 2 the cottontail pattern 5 times 60 rounds in 4 6 pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from total the row below and k tbl pick up and k 14 16 heel flap 18 sts along your heel flap if you are using a contrast colour for the heel round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm k start knitting your heel in contrast yarn now 2 4 6 work next row of the cottontail do not break your main coloured yarn pattern across the front of sock k 2 4 6 sm ssk k to end of round turn your work so the ws is facing you you are now going to be working back and forth round 2 k to m sm k 2 4 6 work next row on the next 28 32 36 sts the remaining 28 of the cottontail pattern across the front of 32 36 sts are the front of the sock and will sock k 2 4 6 sm k to end of round be left unworked for now repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have row 1 ws sl1 p 27 31 35 decreased down to your original stitch count with 28 32 36 sts on the back of your sock row 2 rs sl1 k1 repeat across 28 32 36 sts k to m sm this is now your bor and you can remove the other st markers as you work the repeat row 1 and 2 13 15 17 more times next round 14 16 18 in total then work row 1 once more 2 cottontail socks by debbie ford foot round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of continue working in established pattern until round k2tog 4 sts decreased the foot measures 4 cm / 1 5 inches less than desired foot length i recommend ending round 2 k to end of round having worked row 6 or 12
